thread.title_full: Excellent location for all the key sights in New York - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jean433
title: Excellent location for all the key sights in New York -
text: We stayed here for 4 nights in early March and really enjoyed it. The hotel staff were amazing - very friendly, welcoming and incredibly helpful. The rooms are large, well decorated with great (very large) shower in a large bathroom. There was a pod coffee maker in the room and the temperature was lovely throughout our time there - it was below zero outside. We walked to Times Square and Broadway in a couple of minutes and the bars, restaurants on 9th Avenue were reasonably priced and very varied.
